thread.title: Trump in favor of teachers carrying guns
thread.title_full: Trump in favor of teachers carrying guns

title: Trump in favor of teachers carrying guns
text:
Trump in favor of teachers carrying guns 
Updated: Sun, Oct 11 2015, 11:51 PM 
By: CBS/Face the Nation 
NEW YORK -- After a mass shooting left nine dead and as many injured at an Oregon community college, Donald Trump is weighing in the the subject. 
Trump says he has a concealed weapon permit and carries a gun at times. The Republican presidential front-runner is also in favor of teachers being armed in the classroom. 
"Had they had, as an example for the horrible thing that just took place in Oregon -- had somebody in that room had a gun, the results would have been better," Trump said. 
Trump says he feels better himself when he is armed. 
"If you have the teacher, assuming they knew how to use the weapon, which hopefully they would, you would have been better when this maniac walked into class starting to shoot people," Trump said. 
A CBS News poll out on Sunday shows trump still leading the GOP at 27% support. Ben Carson follows Trump at 21% support. Related Stories
